title: Ham, broccoli and tomato pasta salad
ingredients: ['85g uncooked tri-colour fusilli pasta', '450g chopped ham', '140g broccoli florets', '85g chopped red onion', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '3 tablespoons mustard', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '300ml vegetable oil', '75ml distilled malt vinegar', '150g halved cherry tomatoes']
